edu.illinois.mitra.starl.gvh

Class GlobalVarHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.illinois.mitra.starl.gvh.GlobalVarHolder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RealGlobalVarHolder, SimGlobalVarHolder

    public abstract class GlobalVarHolder
extends java.lang.Object
    The GlobalVarHolder encapsulates all communication, location, identification, logging, tracing, and platform specific functionality. It is the core of the StarL framework and is used by nearly all StarL functions.
